title: Game Timer Bug and Chat Bug
body:
When i look at my friends in game timer it shows above 190:00 minutes. None of my mates seem to have this!
The chat bug is when i message someone and there message is shown above my message not below it!
This bug was new about 1 week

replies.body:
Hey man,

Sounds to me like your systems clock might be out of wack, could you try making sure your system clock is set to the correct timezone and then sync that with an Internet Time Server, there's a good guide [here](http://www.guidingtech.com/3119/windows-clock-sync/) on how to achieve that.

Let me know if this helps, thanks.
Hey mate it worked, Thankyou so much!!!
